flows.title: Breathe & Meditate
flows.description: Ease into your practice with gentle postures, deep breathing exercises, and mindfulness techniques designed to calm the mind, reduce stress, and cultivate inner peace.

poses.name: Standing Side Stretch
poses.instructions:
1. Stand tall and raise both arms overhead.
2. Clasp hands and gently lean to one side.
3. Breathe deeply and switch sides.

poses.name: Tree Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Balance on one leg and place the other on your inner thigh.
2. Bring hands to heart center or raise overhead.
3. Focus on a point and breathe steadily.

poses.name: Bound Angle Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Sit with feet together and knees out to the sides.
2. Hold your feet or ankles with your hands.
3. Gently press knees down and breathe.

flows.title: Gentle Flow
flows.description: A slow-paced sequence of foundational poses that improve flexibility and joint mobility, perfect for beginners or anyone looking for a restorative, low-impact session.

poses.name: Seated Forward Bend
poses.instructions:
1. Sit with legs extended in front of you.
2. Inhale, then exhale and fold forward from the hips.
3. Reach for your feet and relax your neck.

poses.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
poses.instructions:
1. Start on all fours with wrists under shoulders.
2. Inhale to arch your back (cow), lifting your head.
3. Exhale to round your spine (cat), tucking chin.

poses.name: Triangle Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Step feet wide and turn front foot out.
2. Extend arms and reach forward, then down.
3. Raise other arm up and gaze at your hand.

flows.title: Core & Strength Flow
flows.description: Power up your practice with dynamic movements and targeted core work that build stability, tone muscles, and boost overall enduranceâ€”ideal if you want to feel strong and energized.

poses.name: Boat Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Sit and lift your legs to a V-shape.
2. Extend your arms forward, parallel to the floor.
3. Engage your core and hold the position.

poses.name: Side Plank Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Begin in plank and shift weight to one side.
2. Stack feet and raise top arm to the sky.
3. Keep hips lifted and core strong.

poses.name: Chair Pose
poses.instructions:
1. Stand with feet together and bend knees.
2. Reach arms overhead, keeping back straight.
3. Shift weight into heels and hold.
